{"id":1081862689,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 2 weeks","timestamp":1698039373,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1081862689/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Power of Four","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    // Basic Bit Manipulation\n    bool isPowerOfFour(int n) {\n        // Powers of 2 will have only 1 Set Bit\n        // Therefore, on Bit-wise AND-ing n (a power of 2) with (n-1), we must get 0\n        if(n<=0 || n&(n-1)!=0) return false;\n        int trailingZeroes=0;\n        while(n>1) {\n            trailingZeroes++;\n            n>>=1; // Right Shift, i.e., dividing by 2 (Eventually it will become 1)\n        }\n        return trailingZeroes%2==0; // Must have Even Number of Trailing Zeroes\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"power-of-four","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
